Terms: Enterprise Architecture - Frameworks and governance methods for aligning IT and organizational structures
Process Management - Adaptive business process modeling and case management approaches
Context Modeling - Use of ontologies, FCA, and reasoning for contextual representation
Workflow Automation - Statecharts and BPMN for managing workflows and variability
Crisis Management - Simulation and resource planning for floods and emergency situations
Blockchain - Adoption and trust mechanisms in decentralized systems and contracts
Trust Models - Social, digital, and technological dimensions of trust requirements
Model-Driven Design - MDA approaches for aligning goals, features, and system models
